briefTitle: A Phase 3 Study to Evaluate Combination Therapy With Daclatasvir and Sofosbuvir in the Treatment of HIV and Hepatitis C Virus Coinfection.
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Evaluation of Daclatasvir Plus Sofosbuvir in Treatment-na√Øve and Treatment-experienced Chronic Hepatitis C (Genotype 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, or 6) Subjects Coinfected With Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV)
summary: A study of the efficacy and safety of the combination of daclatasvir and sofosbuvir in the treatment of hepatitis C virus and HIV coinfection.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Genotype 1 Hepatitis C Virus (HCV)-Infected Treatment-naive Participants With Sustained Virologic Response at Follow-up Week 12 (SVR12)
